title: This Week's Top Stories - Omicron Conspiracy Theories, SCOTUS on Abortion & MLB Enters Lockout
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Omicron Conspiracy Theories, SCOTUS on Abortion & MLB Enters Lockout
description:
Right-wing conspiracy theories arise about the COVID-19 Omicron variant, the Supreme Court appears poised to undo Roe v. Wade, and a labor dispute rocks Major League Baseball.
